frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-taskbar-updated
frozen.shortDescription: !!! Development stopped !!!!  Look at Dash to Panel as an alternative: https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/1160/dash-to-panel/
frozen.longDescription:
!!! Development stopped !!!!  Look at Dash to Panel as an alternative: https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/1160/dash-to-panel/

----------------------------------------------------------------------

TaskBar 2020 displays icons of running applications and favorites on the top panel or alternatively on a new bottom panel. Activate, minimize or close tasks with a simple click. 

TaskBar 2020 is a dock-like windows list on the top/bottom bar. 

Fork of zpydr/gnome-shell-extension-taskbar to support newer versions of GNOME
